title: Episode 75: I 8 NY
description:
This week on Let’s Eat In, Cathy talks with Will Griffin and Jonathan Meyer, the sandwich makers at I 8 NY who currently vend their fare at Brooklyn Flea. They discuss the advantages of vending over owning a restaurant. Later, they discuss the viability of making gnocchi on a first date.
This episode is sponsored by Fairway Market.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
